comment: The easiest class you will ever take, but I have very little respect for him. He bribed me to create a good review for him in order to earn extra credit (didn't - got a B). He is not a good instructor, and hit on my friend all semester. Very uncomfortable for her and me.

Dr. Gannage is the best professor I've ever taken! He truly cares about his students and wants everyone in his class to be successful. I am taking him twice for different classes because I enjoy his teaching style so much. He makes an effort to get to know all of his students and gives everyone opportunities to participate!

Dr. G is a great professor. Tests are in class Multiple choice but online. Theyre tough, but if you study the quizzes you will be fine. Marketing Plan group project that's a big part of your grade, which includes a presentation. Book helps with the quizzes but you don't really need it in class. He's funny and likes participation from his class

He is a really nice professor and lectures are always interesting. He gives a lot of papers and the group project is a lot but he is a really easy grader. The tests are long but he lets you have notes during the test and you can see the entire test bank ahead of the test so take good notes and you should be fine.
Dr. G is a great professor. The best professor I had at KSU. Read the textbook and take good lecture notes and you'll be fine.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: Tests on random information that wasn't covered. Multiple times there was material on quizzes that he would teach several classes later and say "I think that was on the quiz." Tons of papers and a massive group project, only problem is they count for enough of the grade that you can't blow them off but not enough to justify the huge time commitment
rating_tags: Get ready to read--SO MANY PAPERS--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Dr.G is the BEST! His class consists of quizzes and 3 tests... it isnt hard if you just READ THE BOOK! He is a funny guy and cares about all his students. He really is passionate about what he teaches. Class is worth going to! i would love to take Dr.G again. There is a semester long group virtual project (make sure you choose group wisely)

Dr G is a really knows what he's talking about and is a solid professor. The class itself isn't too terribly difficult as long as you read the book. Don't try and just use the ppts to study, READ. 3 exams, quizzes online. The group project is an online simulation and is easy if you have a goof group that is proactive and stays on top of the work.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Great teacher, course long project that isn't too hard. just keep up with the work and don't get behind and you will do well.
I didn't like him. He tried too hard to make the class "funny" and "enjoyable". His exams were hard and the group projects can get time-consuming. Take his class at your own risk.

Dr. Gannage is not only a great professor, but also a really awesome guy. He brought humor to the class room which made class fun. He cared to help his students if you asked for it. I would reccomend taking him!
Attendance is mandatory. Weekly quizzes that aren't too difficult, only 10 questions. He is super nice! All the tests are online but in class and they are very difficult.

This is someone who you can tell really loves what he does. He does his best to make the lectures interesting and gets students involved by using them in his examples so the class. Tests are through the question bank that the quizzes are drawn from and after a quiz you can see all the questions so you know exactly what is on the the test.

Dr. Gannage is amusing at times and has some knowledge on Marketing. The tests are quite hard, they come from a test bank from your quizzes throughout the semester. Make sure you read and really study, if you will do this you will do well on the tests.

Professor Gannage was a good teacher.  When it came to grading he could be tough but was very reasonable.  It was always important to come to class because of the attendance policy because it gave us extra points in the end of the semester.

Dr. Gannage has a lot of professional experience in Marketing and has taught the subject for years.  His tests are very difficult but he also allows the use of certain resources on exams.  Extra credit opportunities given as  well as ways to improve grades.  You do have to work hard but he's very fair.  I definitely would take his class again.
Dr gannage is a good teacher... Very interesting and makes the lectures enjoyable. 3 tests. Easy if you put in the work

A group project dominates your grade.  its a marketing simulation that is rather unclear in its scope with an executive summary (20 pgs) at the end.  Tests are online using LockDown browser, must have a proctor if you don't take it in class.  Tests are over 7-8 chapters and questions are taken from test banks, so hard to study for. MUST READ BOOK!!
Take him ! He is very helpful and pretty easy. Some of the material is boring but he makes it fun and interesting !
Professor G is just a sweetheart. He really does want everyone to excel in his course and makes an effort to keep us entertained and engaged!

Lectures aren't boring at all. Professor Gannage is hilarious and makes them interesting. 3 exams, 10 quizzes,4 Short papers, and a semester long group project. Read the book/power point slides, and study the quiz reports (which is where a lot of the ?'s from the test come from) an A is not out of reach.  iwould absolutely a class with him again
3 exams worth 60%. 2 article reviews worth 5%. 2 case studies worth 10%. Group project worth 15%. 10 quizzes worth 10%.

Dr. G is a great professor. This course has a lot of material to cover and can be a bit much when taking the max credit hours. There is a semester long group project, multiple papers, and quizzes every week or so. Some students take the exams in class and others get a proctor. I don't think it's fair b/c it gives some students more time to prepare.

Dr. G made the class go by quick. There were weekly quizzes that gave insight on test questions. With that being said, the test were still very difficult. He allowed you to use your notes though. There was a large group project throughout the semester. You pick your groups early, so pick wisely. Dr. G was helpful throughout the whole thing.

The lectures are essentially him reading through the powerpoint. He knows his stuff and has experience, but teaching is not his forte. I turned in a paper for him that somehow didn't save properly and was blank, I got a 75 & his feedback was "you didn't meet the required word count". The simulation&summary are a lot of work but don't teach anything
Dr. Gannage is a great professor! He grades fairly and is understanding when something comes up. He also gives extra credit and is enjoyable to listen to.

Dr. Gannage was awesome! Although attendance was mandatory he did his best to make lectures enjoyable. All tests were online. 10 quizzes, a few papers, and a group project. Overall a great class. Would definitely recommend taking him!

Nice teacher, lectures are long though and you have to make most of them because after missing 5, you loose a letter grade. You only need the book for the 2 case study's. Other than that, there are 3 test, all open note, but that does not mean it is easy! 10 quizzes that are all on lockdown browser.

Your basic introduction class that covers 20 chapters and expects you to know a small detail on page 312 for tests. He is a nice relatable professor that tries to spark the class full of life. Overall, good teacher for MKT3100

Nice teacher, however lectures are required. If you miss 5, you automatically lose a grade. There are 4 papers throughout the semester, but not to bad. Only need the textbook for 2 of the papers as they are related to case studies. There are 3 tests, which you can use your notes on. 10 quizzes all on lockdown browser.
Dr.G is very helpful and fun! he makes the class lecture interesting and relatable to us students.
Dr. G is a great proffesor. An A is possible as long as you put in a little effort.

Dr. G does is exceptional at relating marketing, real life experiences and current news events into "learned information" that students will be able to utilize after graduation. His enthusiasm and information presentation are consistently well done.   I highly recommend his class for anyone wanting a well rounded introduction to marketing.

I love Dr. G. I always lend him a helping hand at the beginning of class with his technology and he is very helpful when it comes to course content. Lots of work, not hard. Get in a good group and you will pass. GIVES LOTS OF EXTRA CREDIT TOO TO HELP YOU OUT!
Good teacher. go to class and complete assignments.  Tests are easy as long as you study

Mr. G is very knowledgeable and has a lot of experience in marketing.  Supper nice, wants you to do well, and will always try to work with you.  Mr. G went above and beyond what would be require to help me with anything I needed and even helped me with other classes! He is pretty funny too.

Dr. Gannage was very helpful and clear with what his expectations were for this class. There are 4 short papers, 2 case studies, and 2 article reviews which I received an A on all. There are 3 exams on lockdown browser, if you read and take notes you'll be fine. Overall great class and Gannage knows his info and keeps you interested.
Nice guy, fair and willing to help.
Dr. Gannage was a great professor for Marketing. 10/10

Dr. Gannage is incredibly funny, he will make the class very entertaining with his life lessons. He gives you opportunities to excel in the class by giving extra credit. His tests are tough. I would definitely take him again!
Professor Gannage is a great marketing professor who really wants you to succeed in the class. This class does require effort but an A is attainable. Would definitely  take him again.
Great Professor overall

Dr. Gannage is one of the better professors at KSU. He is very knowledgable about the subject and does his best to make the class entertaining. 3 tests (open notes), 2 case studies, 2 article reviews, and a semester long group project. EXTRA CREDIT.
He was always helpful and willing to be there for his students. He gives extra credit to your lowest test grade as well.
I think he is one of the best professors I have had at KSU he is entertaining and you learn a lot about marketing. To

Dr. G is a a really good professor, in class he goes over power points and shares valuable information. His class is mandatory but you are able to miss 5 classes without penalty. He gives some extra credit and it is definitely worth it. There are 3 test and 10 quizzes. I would recommend him.

Great teacher. Funny and cares about his students. Tests are somewhat hard. 50 multiple choice/true or false questions  from the quiz banks. There's about 600-800 quiz questions that could appear on the tests.
His test are hard but open note. I learned nothing from his lecture but the guy is entertaining. The group project is easy if you stay on top of it. I would take this guy again.
He is a good professor, very professional and knowledgeable.
Study quizzes to pass the Tests. About 800 questions a piece to study for each one. Group work that is not difficult but requires participation. 2 articles reviews, 2 case studies, 10 quizzes.

This class was not what I expected but in a good way. Gives extra credit. Can use notes on the test. There is a group project/game that is important and impacts your grade greatly so pick wisely! He cracks jokes, and makes the class time worth it.

Dr. G is the best option for any marketing class. I had him for MKT 3100 and actually switched my major to marketing. He gives real life examples when going over the material,  and is very clear on what he wants. He will also do whatever he can to help you. Great professor to begin the business school with!

He is a really good teacher, fair grader. 3 Tests that are a little difficult. They are completely open note and multiple choice. Weekly online quizzes and 4 small writing assignments but they don't count for much. Takes attendance but you get 5 skip days.
Dr. G is the best teacher I have had so far. He makes class enjoyable to go to and he gives a lot of extra credit opportunities.
Test are based off the quizzes, study the quizzes and you will be fine.
Gives extra credit as well! group project the entire semester-it's doable. pick good people you'll be doing a lot of work with them!

This class was great and I think this professor brought a lot of experience in this lectures. Take notes out of the book and compare them to your quiz questions and you'll do fine on the test. The simulation is fun and challenging. Take this class!!

Gannage is a great professor and is hilarious. He is very nice and is always willing to help and answer any questions  regarding tests, or the group project. Make sure you do choose reliable people for your group project because it is a huge chunk of your grade. Overall workload is heavy, but if you stay on top of it, you should be able to get an A

Dr. G is really funny and personable. His lectures are PPTs, but he goes into a lot of detail. The (3) tests are open note. There are 4 papers total but they aren't bad at all, and he grades fairly. 10 quizzes. Offers a lot of extra credit. Very straightforward just make sure you take good notes for the tests.

Dr. Gannage is intentional on teaching the material. He also posts all of the power points and provides a database of what the tests will cover. The book is essential due to case studies and a couple of essays. If you are not clear on anything, then he would be glad show you.
Tests are based upon the quizzes given weekly. Keeps lecturing interesting and how it relates to the real world. Would def take again!

Dr. Gannage is a good guy. His tests are very tough, though. The quizzes use a test bank that he later uses for the tests. The key to this class is to study the test bank after the quiz. The bank is huge. You have to get the book for the 4 papers you will write. The papers are simple, even though instructions are not very clear for any assignment.
All in all he was a very interesting professor, very clear and direct with his grading. Pretty easy, just come to class!
Great class! Really interesting and informative, participation is very important! Over all easy but demands lots of work
It's a pretty easy class. There are only 2 tests and a final. The tests are pretty tough as well. He does take attendance.

Dr. Gannage is a great professor who cares about his students. I would absolutely recommend taking him! He really teaches you about marketing as a whole and puts it into real life situations. Attendance is mandatory but his classes are fun to attend! Long semester group project so make sure you get fantastic group members!

Dr. Gannage seemed tough at first but throughout the course and getting to know him, he is very helpful. I bought the textbook because he requires it in order to do the 2 Case Studies. 3 exams. Group Project. 2 Article reviews. 10 quizzes.
Passionate about teaching this marketing class and very willing to work with students on materials and questions

Dr. Gannage is very funny and easy going. Assigns two case studies, two article reviews and three tests. Everything is pretty clear cut from his notes. Tests are open notes and provides a test bank to study from. Overall if you do the work, you'll make an A.
Dr. Gannage's tests were over a lot of chapters! They weren't that hard, but you definitely need to pay attention to the weekly online quizzes.

His style of class is all over the place and test are made from a giant test bank.  The material in the test is not common knowledge so you better find a good way to remember the test bank questions! The test are open note though, didnt help me.
Easy class, hard test.
really nice guy! would recommend taking him to anyone just entering Coles College, like myself. he's a great entry into the program.
Great professor. Love the interaction in the class and the group debate. Take him!

Dr. Gannage is very strait forward and is very flexible. He works with his students and allows for tests to be proctored outside of class. He offered two separate dates to take the final exam which is not cumulative. Only two other test other than the final. He is very animated and is passionate about marketing. Definitely recommend taking him.
Great teacher for Marketing 3100!
This professor is a very good teacher and cares about his students. You do have to show up to class, but it is definitely worth it. Enjoyable lectures and notes are allowed on the test.
I love professor Gannage ! He's really funny ! Makes lectures interesting ! Easy A if you do all your work. Attendence is mandatory.. I would definitely take him again !

Dr. G is a great professor. DONT SKIP CLASS! He has lots of experience and life examples. Cares about his students and willing to help you understand concepts. Gives some extra credit . Book is nessesary and has multiple assignments to better your grade.

Professor Gannage tells you from day one what he expects from you as a student and the key to passing his class. He gives clear instructions and is always willing to help after class if you have any questions. He is knowledgable about the topics discussed in class and explains them in detail, in a way that you can understand.

Dr. G is awesome! You can tell that he really loves marketing. Lectures are good, he keeps you awake with jokes & real life marketing examples that you can RELATE to and UNDERSTAND! Take GOOD notes, tests are open note but hard. 1 group project 1 online quiz each week, 2 tests + final exam. Attendance is mandatory. Great professor, would take again

Dr. G is the best. He cares for his students and does everything he can to help us pass. 2 tests, each over 10 chapters and cumulative final. He gives you a study guide that is basically the test but does require serious studying. Semester long group project, pick a good group because its a ton of work and worth a lot of your grade. He rocks!

Dr. Gannage is very interactive in his lectures. He is enthusiastic about Marketing, and tries to make it fun for his students. There are 3 tests (including the final), a semester long group project, and quizzes after every other chapter. I would definitely recommend him as a professor!
Doc is awesome man. He knows how to make the subject of Marketing fun.  All-time favorite teacher. Also, He's the snazziest Doctor ever

Dr. Gannage was really helpful during this class. He is not conventional in that he actually likes to get to know his students better and make sure they understand the concepts of marketing. I will definitely take him again for future classes and I would recommend him to you as well. P.S. please attend the classes they are important.
Straight forward class and studying is important. Offers a lot of extra credit

Dr. G is a great professor and very helpful. He truly cares about his students and wants them to do well. With that being said he is very fair and will not just hand out A's ,you must earn them. However, he is willing to help you out if you deserve it. He also offers extra credit opportunities and is overall very funny!  Certainly reccomend
Dr. G's class was definitely challenging, but in the best way possible. I learned so much and am glad I took the class. Awesome professor, awesome class!
He's great!!!

Dr. G is a great teacher but also is respectful and everyone in class respect him. You'll have a team project so choose your team wisely. I loved MY TEAM. Over all i recommend taking him. Apply yourself and you do GREAT!
He was awesome! Really was helpful during the semester whenever I needed anything.
Dr Gannage required attendance, but was forgiving if you had a valid reason. Tests are online in the Lock Down browser. Make sure you get a good group for the semester project.

I enjoyed taking Dr. G class. This semester was extremely rough for me and he provided me with the assistance needed to pass his class. I worked full-time and took his 8pm class and he made the class exciting and  I was able to remain attentive. There are 3 exams, case study & Article review,  weekly quizzes & a group project. Take his course!
Dr. Gannage makes his class interesting and honestly tries to help students.

Dr. G is a good professor and always makes his lectures entertaining. Everything is pretty by the book, and your grade heavily relies on your test grades so be prepared to focus most of your energy on that. Overall, I would recommend him!
Dr. G is awesome, great guy and interesting lectures with real life experience, be ready to study!

Dr. Gannage is amazing!  He's interactive and offers plenty of opportunities to succeed, including extra credit and is flexible on deadlines.  He even dressed up and passed out candy for Halloween! He has a great personality and is willing to work with students, he understands we have busy schedules.  3 Exams- all open note.
Great teacher! Explains the material well and test are not hard if you start studying two weeks in advance.

He is one of the best professor's i  have ever had. He is really clear on what is expected from the students and if you do the work, you will pass the class and get a good grade. i highly recommend for this class because he cares for the students and wants you to pass. He gives you opportunities to to get good grades in his class like extra credit.

Dr. Gannage is a great professor at KSU. He really wants every student to pass with an A, and he is willing to help you out all the time. He is easily reachable for any questions you have unlike other professors. I would take him again if i had a option. He gives great feedback on all the assignments.

Dr. Gannage, in my opinion, is definitely one of the better professors at KSU. He is very interactive with his students during his lectures and just makes class fun, thereby actually making me want to stay and listen. He really takes his students opinions into account and does whatever he can to help them, which is great. I would take him again.

Dr. G is the best marketing professor there is in my opinion. I learned a lot from him this semester. He made the class fun and engaging. There is a group project, but its easy. The tests are not too bad. You should get no less than a B in this class. He is a great professor!

Dr Gannage is one of the best teachers i have taken at Kennesaw State. He makes classes interesting and is a professor that is willing to work with you. He gives you advice on papers and helps you where ever you need it. He gives you ample opporutnity for extra credit and gives you all the tools you need to succeed.

I strongly recommend taking Dr. G. He is a fair grader and if you mess up on a assignment he gives you an extension on the assignments. Test are straightforward. Take good notes open note test you should pass the class. Instead of doing a traditional marketing project you play a pretty cool simulation game instead. Good teacher
Great professor. Definitely got a lot out of this class as a Marketing Major. Would GLOWINGLY recommend everyone take this class!

Dr. G is a great professor. I highly recommend taking his class. He lists all projects,  exams, and papers in the syllabus. He provides great guidelines and examples for all projects. He gives a study guide for the 3 exams making it easy to study. As long as you show up to class and follow the syllabus, this class will be a great class for you.
Dr. G is one of the most helpful professors I've had at KSU. He will always work with you to get the best grade possible, is prompt in answering emails, and is so encouraging!! Definitely take him.

Dr. G was one of the best teachers I've had in college. He is great teacher and he gets involved with all of his students. He makes class fun and worth coming to. Just attend all classes and make sure you meet deadlines and you'll get a good grade. Make sure you choose good people for your groups! I would take him over any other marketing teacher.
Dr. G was awesome. A great, personable professor who really cares about his students and does everything he can to ensure you pass. I definitely recommend him. More professor should be like him.
Dr. G is great! He really tries to make marketing fun and applicable to real life. There are 2 tests and a final. There is also a group project with a paper, but it's easy and fun.
Dr. G was great! Although he was sometimes unclear with what wanted, his class was easy. Read the book and you should be fine.

2 Exams + Cumulative Final of all 24 chapters of the book.  He did not create the exams so what you learn in Dr. Gannage's class isn't always what you will be tested on.  The Exams are challenging to say the least so prep hard.  If it weren't for the Exams, this class would be a breeze. 4 papers and a group project over the duration of the semester

Dr. Gannage is a fantastic professor and is very helpful. He is there for you when you need a question. He even gives you real-world experience on his life in the Marketing field! I have a B at the moment and would love to pass with an A if possible. Overall, he is a good professor to take.

This class was overall a quality class. The professor taught what needed to be taught, but watch out for the group project. You will be teamed up against the whole class and there's a 15 page paper at the end of it. The case studies are easy and he has 2 tests and a final. Don't skip and study hard, you'll do fine.

DR. G is one of the best professors i have ever had, he really goes the extra mile in making things interesting in class. I really hope you read this review and take him! this marketing class was very interesting.

Dr. Gannage is a professor that gives as much as he receives.   If you don't go to class(required) or  participate, then expect to learn much.   He is probably one of the most approachable professors at KSU and always willing to help.   Take advantage of the extra credit opportunities,  do the quizzes and you will do fine in the course.

Dr. G replaced initial instructor just after first exam. Transition: painless. He engaged the class in his lectures and made each session interesting. Exams online with grade being the best of two attempts (1 in lock down browser). Group marketing plan and presentation mandatory. Non-marketing major but would take another class, if it's with Dr. G.
Great teacher would take again!!
Great Professor!
Tests are tough. Give study guide. Not many assignment for the class. Group project wasn't bad.

HE MAKES THE CLASS FUN. HE USES A LOT OF PERSONAL EXPERIENCES TO GIVE EXAMPLES AND HE'LL MAKE IT A POINT TO LEARN YOUR NAME. THE DRAW BACK IS THAT HE ONLY HAS 2 TESTS THAT ARE COMPUTER RANDOMIZED FROM A 1500 QUESTION BANK AND INCLUDE CRITERIA FROM 10 CH. EACH. IT WAS REALLY HARD TO STUDY FOR THE TESTS BUT ALL OTHER ASSIGNMENTS ARE SUPER EASY!
Really easy teacher! If you skip class then you won't pass. Overall I would take him again if I could!! Best marketing professor at Kennesaw state!

Really nice guy that cares about his students. You must attend class in order to pass without any penalty. Not many test and grades are pretty fair. Gives grades back in resonable time frame. Great Professor, would take again
Two tests for the semester (+ final); both are challenging, but plenty of other grades to help weigh it out. Makes the best corny jokes.    - NM

Dr. Gannage is probably one of the most respected professors at KSU. He is understanding and has a great personality. He makes class entertaining and uses real life experiences to connect with the course criteria. His tests are pretty tough but he's a fair grader for other assignments. I wish Dr. Gannage taught other classes at KSU! Recommended!!!

Great Professor and is fair with grades. Gives opportunities for extra credit such as perfect attendance (do it) -2 article reviews from online sources (easy)  -2 Case Study's from the textbook. (easy) -3 Tests (medium to hard difficulty)  Focus on PowerPoint's & Bold terms in textbook (organized notes helps!!) -1 Group Project (Medium difficulty)

He is a great professor. He wants you to pass and gives out extra credit opportunities. Quizzes are easy. Tests are a little difficult make sure to study quizzes and notes for exams. Participation matters if you want the extra credit he gives for attending. Grading criteria is clear and helps with examples for the major group project.

Dr Gannage makes the class lively and brings a wealth of real world experience into this class. The class is interactive, practical  and hands-on. It is obvious Dr Gannage is interested in impacting knowledge by encouraging students to attend very beneficial lectures/seminars. He also reward students with extra credits  opportunities for learning.

Dr. Gannage uses real world experiences to teach in class. Don't miss class because he takes attendance and gives extra credit for perfect attendance. The notes in class are very beneficial for the tests and quizzes because he highlights on what is especially important. Plenty of opportunity for extra help if you need it. He gets the class involved

Dr. G makes class very interesting, if he knows you your in for a treat because at the end of the semester the whole class will know your name! All his test are online, along with the quizzes. From my personal experience make sure you know the terms and don't be afraid to ask for help he is always will to help anyone in anyway possible. Take Him!

Dr. G is amazing!!! He has been one of the most helpful professors at Kennesaw. He cares about everyone especially if you care about his class. He is laid back and always encouraging. His tests were pretty straight forward and there are weekly open book quizzes that were honestly for your benefit. Take him!!!!

This was a pretty straightforward class. The retail game was interesting and better than doing a business plan! The tests were difficult because you have to have a full understanding of the terms, so READ THE BOOK!! He lectures but it's not dry because he adds his personal experience.
I took his basic retailing class over the summer and I actually learned a lot from Dr. Gannage. He does have long lectures but he keeps them interesting.

I took his Basic Retailing, MKTG 4300, over the summer and it was a great experience. He had long lectures, but he kept them amusing and interesting without seeming to try too hard. Great Teacher and I would take him again if I wasn't about to graduate. Highly recommend anyone thinking about taking his class.

A wonderful teach! I learned a lot from his class and would be eager to take another class with him. He cares about his students and goes out of his way to connect with each and every one of them. He lectures most day but keeps it interstesting and entertaining.

He's hilarious with lots of experience in his field, gives real life examples to better understand the concepts. He works very well with students and gives feedback in a good time, He is a very nice professor you'll like him! oh n He dresses well!!!
Really knows what he is talking about, has experience in his field and has many years of teaching under his belt.  Has funny stories and is willing to work with students on mostly anything.

Dr. G is a great professor, I appreciate any teacher that can keep me engaged with funny stories while relating it back to the material. He does put people on the spot a lot, but its more of a conversation class- he wants people to talk with him. The case studies are lengthy, but he gives great feedback. Responds to emails fast & enjoys his class.

Professor Gannage not only taught you the material for his class, but he also taught you life lessons that will help you in your future and past college. Professor Gannage is  a great professor and would help you with anything. He is very specific, and his tests are definitely doable if you study.

Dr. G is an amazing professor. As a marketing major, I learned a lot in his class that prepared me for future endeavors. He has experience in the field translates concepts learned in the class with real-world experiences. There is one long group project in the form of a marketing plan, but with a good group, work can be divided up and isn't bad.

Professor Gannage came mid-semester and replaced our other teacher .At first, he was more tough than she was. But, in the end the class was an Easy A if you did the work and studied. Powerpoints posted online, tests online. Study guides not very helpful, but he saved my semester by bumping me up 2  points to an A. He will help however he can!

While this professor is a nice guy, his assignment instructions are very unclear. The semester-long group project was a huge hassle because he didn't accurately explain the requirements and it didn't clearly relate to the lectures or examples. Study guides were useless. Did not buy the textbook, still got an A. Felt like a lot of busy work.
Dr. Gannage is one of the most helpful professors I've had at KSU. He will always work with you to correct  your  mistakes, is prompt in answering emails, and is so encouraging!! Definitely take him.
